/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high angle, providing a bird's eye view of the street below. The street is lined with trees, their leaves a vibrant green against the clear blue sky. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene. Parked cars line the side of the street, their metallic bodies gleaming under the sunlight. Buildings rise in the background, their architecture a testament to the city's blend of modern and traditional styles.
